clip.quote: You can actually now put in pictures of a property... and it will look at the pictures and write a description of it.
clip.why_clipworthy: Demonstrates a practical use of AI that can save agents time and improve listing quality.
clip.suggested_hook: Struggling with property descriptions? Let AI do the heavy lifting!

script:
```json
{
  "script": {
    "HOOK": "(0:00-0:08) Struggling with property descriptions? Let AI do the heavy lifting!",
    "SETUP": "(0:08-0:18) Meet Carrie McCormick, a top real estate agent, sharing how AI is revolutionizing property listings.",
    "INSIGHT": "(0:18-0:40) You can actually now put in pictures of a property... and it will look at the pictures and write a description of it. This AI tool analyzes images to craft compelling and accurate descriptions, saving you time and boosting listing quality.",
    "REFRAME/APPLICATION": "(0:40-0:52) Imagine freeing up hours each week while enhancing your listings' appeal. Implement this AI tool to streamline your process.",
    "CTA": "(0:52-0:60) Ready to elevate your listings? Explore AI tools today and transform your real estate game!"
  },
  "CAPTION": "Let AI transform your property listings! Discover how it can save you time and enhance quality. #RealEstateAI",
  "HASHTAGS": [
    "#RealEstateAI",
    "#PropertyListings",
    "#AIinRealEstate",
    "#RealEstateTips",
    "#AgentTools"
  ],
  "CONTENT_PILLAR": "ai_agent"
}
```

clip.quote: When people go the extra mile for you as a client, as a patient, as a guest, you will always remember how they made you feel.
clip.why_clipworthy: Highlights the importance of exceptional client service in real estate.
clip.suggested_hook: Want to leave a lasting impression on your clients? Here's how.

script:
```json
{
  "script": {
    "HOOK": "Want to leave a lasting impression on your clients? Here's how.",
    "SETUP": "In real estate, exceptional service is your secret weapon. Carrie McCormick shares why going the extra mile is unforgettable.",
    "INSIGHT": "When people go the extra mile for you as a client, as a patient, as a guest, you will always remember how they made you feel. This emotional connection is what sets you apart in the real estate industry.",
    "REFRAME/APPLICATION": "Exceptional service isn't just a nicety; it's a necessity. Apply this by personalizing your interactions and exceeding expectations.",
    "CTA": "Think about how you can go the extra mile today. Share your ideas in the comments!"
  },
  "CAPTION": "Exceptional service creates unforgettable experiences. Are you going the extra mile? #RealEstate",
  "HASHTAGS": ["#RealEstate", "#ClientService", "#GoTheExtraMile", "#CarrieMcCormick", "#RealEstateTips"],
  "CONTENT_PILLAR": "top_producer_secrets"
}
```
